cdiInputSpecification.description: Specification of CDI inputs for this channel. See CDI Input Specification for more details.

channelId.description: ID of the channel in MediaPackage that is the destination for this output group.

destinations.description: Destinations for channel. See Destinations for more details.

encoderSettings.description: Encoder settings. See Encoder Settings for more details.

inputAttachments.description: Input attachments for the channel. See Input Attachments for more details.

inputSpecification.description: Specification of network and file inputs for the channel.

logLevel.description: The log level to write to Cloudwatch logs.

maintenance.description: Maintenance settings for this channel. See Maintenance for more details.

name.description:
Name of the Channel.

The following arguments are optional:

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the channel. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

vpc.description: Settings for the VPC outputs. See VPC for more details.
